title: The Final Reckoning
description: Robin Jarvis's thrilling finale to the Deptford Mice Trilogy unfolds in this page-turning volume. Back from the dead, the spirit of Jupiter-the evil cat who was once Lord of the sewer rats-wreaks more destruction than ever. The Deptford Mice feel his chilling grasp everywhere they turn-their allies are murdered and the Starglass, their source of knowledge and power, has been stolen. The mice know they face the most desperate struggle of their lives. Will anyone survive?
author: Robin Jarvis
